name: Mood (Michael-R93)
description:
A Doom like game where the goal is to remove all bad mood in the world and blow kisses at your enemies to calm them down, then finish them off with a hug! The end goal is to hug the Devil.

  • Michael Ringqvist: 2D Art
  • Lukas Erlend Kohlmann Tvedt: 2D Art/Animations
  • Henrik Nilsen Aasvik: Music/Sound/Level Design
  • Ivar Haugseth: Lead Programmer

Controls:

  1. wasd: move 
  2. Space: Jump
  3. Left Click: Hug
  4. Right Click: Blow-kiss
